entry.title: Invoke-ElevatedCommand
entry.summary: Invokes the provided script block in a new elevated (Administrator) powershell process, while retaining access to the pipeline (pipe in and out). Please note, "Write-Host" output will be LOST - only the object pipeline and errors are handled. In general, prefer "Write-Output" over "Write-Host" unless UI output is the only possible use of the information.
